titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on the Climate Crisis in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.
Providing amounts for the expenses of the Select Committee on the Climate Crisis in the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution provides amounts for the expenses of the House Select Committee on the Climate Crisis for the 117th Congress.
